summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Florence Court from East Denny Way to Thirty-seventh Avenue North et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading & curbing under Ordinance No. 16482, creating Local Improvement District No. 1528 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
